exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.CannotPredictProducts(reagents: List[str], function_name: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised when a function failed to predict reaction products based on reaction reagents.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.LessActiveMetalReagent(metal: str, molecule: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised by metal activity restriction if the metal to be replaced in the salt or acid is more active.

Bases: MiniChemistryException

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.WeakElectrolyteNotFound(products: List[str], variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised if a weak electrolyte is not found among the reaction products.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.WrongIon(formula: str, ion: str, expected_ion: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised when an ion expected by the mechanism is not as expected. (Used in nitrate_decomposition mechanism)

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.WrongMetalActivity(metal: str, activity: str, expected_activity: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised when activity (from metal activity series) of a given metal is not as expected.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.MechanismExceptions.WrongSimpleClass(formula: str, simple_class: str, expected_class: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MechanismException

Raised when a mechanism method received a substance with a wrong simple class (NOT simple SUBclass)

Bases: MechanismException

Raised when a mechanism method received a substance with a wrong simple subclass (NOT simple CLASS)

miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.SubstanceExceptions module¶

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.SubstanceExceptions.ChargeError(charge: int, neutrality: bool)¶

Bases: SubstanceException

Used to indicate that the charge is not as expected.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.SubstanceExceptions.ElementNotFound(element, variables: dict)¶

Bases: SubstanceException

Raised when an element with a certain symbol is not found in a periodic table, BUT the call of the exception happened from the Substance.py or related classes or methods.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.SubstanceExceptions.MultipleElementCation(cation, variables: dict)¶

Bases: SubstanceException

Raised when a cation containing more than one element is met. These cations are not supported by miniChemistry module.

exception miniChemistry.Core.CoreExceptions.SubstanceExceptions.SubstanceConvertionError(substance_to, substance_from, function_name: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: SubstanceException

Raised when the code failed to convert one substance type to another.

Bases: SubstanceException

Raised when the size of a substance (number of chemical elements) is not as expected.
